column3: ACK to the code and visual changes!\n
I think it looks better with the grid lines. They should stay.\n
I don't see alternating tinted rows, so without the grid lines it's kindof hard to read sometimes...\n
@Daminvar @luke-jr \nAgreed, it does look better with gridlines, but only the vertical ones. There's no need for horizontal gridlines because any one with decent eyes can tell the lines apart.\n
I think you confused vertical and horizontal...\n
Lines going left to right are needed, not up and down...\n
Too much bikeshedding. This was supposed to be a simple non-controversial commit, not a discussion topic. I'm closing this, and re-submitting it without the grid change.\n
